Source code for ctqa.roi_select

"""
Title:.........CTQA Region of Interest Selection
Description: Module for region of interest selection and associated calculations.
"""

#!/usr/bin/env python3
import sys
import logging
import pydicom
import numpy as np
from ctqa import logutil

logger = logging.getLogger(logutil.MAIN_LOG_NAME)

    

[docs]def getImageROIs(imgPaths, __DEBUG, __SAVEROIS):
  rois = []
  for path in imgPaths:
    dataset = pydicom.dcmread(path)
    roi = getROI(dataset, __DEBUG, __SAVEROIS)
    rois.append(roi)
  
  return rois


  
# Loops through flat ROI array and turns into 2d ROI array  

[docs]def reformROIArray(data, x1, x2):
  counter = 0
  arr = []
  tempArr = []
  length = x2-x1
  for i in range(len(data)):
    if counter == length-1:
      tempArr.append(data[i])
      arr.append(tempArr)
      tempArr = []
      counter = 0
    else:
      tempArr.append(data[i])
      counter = counter + 1
  
  return arr



# Scales pixel image values linearly by rescale values

[docs]def scalePixelData(pixelData, rInt, rSlope):
  scaledPixelData = []
  for pixelRow in pixelData:
    scaledPixelRow = []
    
    for pixelValue in pixelRow:
      pixelScale = (rSlope * pixelValue) + rInt
      scaledPixelRow.append(pixelScale)
      
    scaledPixelData.append(scaledPixelRow)
  
  return scaledPixelData


# Selects a specified area from a 2D array and fills a 1D arr with the values

[docs]def selectArea(arr, x1, y1, x2, y2):
  areaArr = []
  for row in range(y1, y2):
    for col in range(x1, x2):
      areaArr.append(arr[row][col])
  
  return areaArr

  

# Draws QC ROI on QC DICOM images. Extracts mean and std dev for each image

[docs]def getROI(dataset, __DEBUG, __SAVEROIS):
  if __DEBUG: # Prints out img attrbs if true
    logger.debug("")
    logger.debug("Storage type.....: %s", dataset.SOPClassUID)
    logger.debug("")

    pat_name = dataset.PatientName
    display_name = pat_name.family_name + ", " + pat_name.given_name
    logger.debug("Patient Name.....: %s", display_name)
    logger.debug("Modality.........: %s", dataset.Modality)
    logger.debug("Study Date.......: %s", dataset.StudyDate)

    if 'PixelData' in dataset:
      rows = int(dataset.Rows)
      cols = int(dataset.Columns)
      logger.debug("Image size.......: {rows:d} x {cols:d}, {size:d} bytes".format(
        rows=rows, cols=cols, size=len(dataset.PixelData)))
      if 'PixelSpacing' in dataset:
        logger.debug("Pixel spacing....: %s", dataset.PixelSpacing)
    else:
      errMsg = "PixelData was not found in the dicom file"
      raise ValueError(errMsg)

    logger.debug("Slice location...: %s", dataset.get('SliceLocation', "(missing)"))
    logger.debug("Rescale Intercept: %s", dataset.RescaleIntercept)
    logger.debug("Rescale Slope:...: %s", dataset.RescaleSlope)

    logger.debug("Pixel Array......:")
    logger.debug(dataset.pixel_array)

  scaledData = []
  if dataset.RescaleIntercept and dataset.RescaleSlope:
    scaledData = scalePixelData(dataset.pixel_array, dataset.RescaleIntercept, dataset.RescaleSlope)
  else:
    errMsg = "ERROR: No RescaleIntercept and RescaleSlope values were found"
    logger.debug(errMsg)
    scaledData = dataset.pixel_array

  # Getting initial config values from image
  centerX = int(dataset.Rows/2) # Center of image X/Y
  centerY = int(dataset.Columns/2)
  spacingXROI = 75/dataset.PixelSpacing[1] # For getting different ROIs
  spacingYROI = 75/dataset.PixelSpacing[0]
  halfLengthXROI = 10/dataset.PixelSpacing[1] # For getting  area of ROI
  halfLengthYROI = 10/dataset.PixelSpacing[0]

  # Center X/Y points
  cyl = int(centerX - halfLengthXROI)
  cxl = int(centerY - halfLengthYROI)
  cyr = int(centerX + halfLengthXROI)
  cxr = int(centerY + halfLengthYROI)

  # Top X/Y Points
  tyl = int((centerX - spacingXROI) - halfLengthXROI)
  txl = int(centerY - halfLengthYROI)
  tyr = int((centerX - spacingXROI) + halfLengthXROI)
  txr = int(centerY + halfLengthYROI)

  # Bottom X/Y Points
  byl = int((centerX + spacingXROI) - halfLengthXROI)
  bxl = int(centerY - halfLengthYROI)
  byr = int((centerX + spacingXROI) + halfLengthXROI)
  bxr = int(centerY + halfLengthYROI)

  # Left X/Y Points
  lyl = int(centerX - halfLengthXROI)
  lxl = int((centerY - spacingYROI) - halfLengthYROI)
  lyr = int(centerX + halfLengthXROI)
  lxr = int((centerY - spacingYROI) + halfLengthYROI)

  # Right X/Y Points
  ryl = int(centerX - halfLengthXROI)
  rxl = int((centerY + spacingYROI) - halfLengthYROI)
  ryr = int(centerX + halfLengthXROI)
  rxr = int((centerY + spacingYROI) + halfLengthYROI)

  if __DEBUG:
    logger.debug("")
    logger.debug("Center of Image..: {x:d} x {y:d}".format(
      x=centerX, y=centerY))
    logger.debug("Half Length ROI..: {x:f} x {y:f}".format(
      x=halfLengthXROI, y=halfLengthYROI))
    logger.debug("Spacing ROI......: {x:f} x {y:f}".format(
      x=spacingXROI, y=spacingYROI))

    logger.debug("")
    logger.debug("Center X/Ys......: Top Left: {x1:d} x {y1:d}, Bottom Right: {x2:d} x {y2:d}".format(
      x1=cxl, y1=cyl, x2=cxr, y2=cyr))
    logger.debug("Top X/Ys.........: Top Left: {x1:d} x {y1:d}, Bottom Right: {x2:d} x {y2:d}".format(
      x1=txl, y1=tyl, x2=txr, y2=tyr))
    logger.debug("Bottom X/Ys......: Top Left: {x1:d} x {y1:d}, Bottom Right: {x2:d} x {y2:d}".format(
      x1=bxl, y1=byl, x2=bxr, y2=byr))
    logger.debug("Left X/Ys........: Top Left: {x1:d} x {y1:d}, Bottom Right: {x2:d} x {y2:d}".format(
      x1=lxl, y1=lyl, x2=lxr, y2=lyr))
    logger.debug("Right X/Ys.......: Top Left: {x1:d} x {y1:d}, Bottom Right: {x2:d} x {y2:d}".format(
      x1=rxl, y1=ryl, x2=rxr, y2=ryr))


  cROI = selectArea(scaledData, cxl, cyl, cxr, cyr)
  tROI = selectArea(scaledData, txl, tyl, txr, tyr)
  bROI = selectArea(scaledData, bxl, byl, bxr, byr)
  lROI = selectArea(scaledData, lxl, lyl, lxr, lyr)
  rROI = selectArea(scaledData, rxl, ryl, rxr, ryr)

  if __DEBUG:
    logger.debug("")
    logger.debug("Center ROI.......: Mean={m:0.4f}, Stdev={s:0.4f}".format(
      m=np.mean(cROI), s=np.std(cROI)))
    logger.debug("Top ROI..........: Mean={m:0.4f}, Stdev={s:0.4f}".format(
      m=np.mean(tROI), s=np.std(bROI)))
    logger.debug("Bottom ROI.......: Mean={m:0.4f}, Stdev={s:0.4f}".format(
      m=np.mean(bROI), s=np.std(tROI)))
    logger.debug("Left ROI.........: Mean={m:0.4f}, Stdev={s:0.4f}".format(
      m=np.mean(lROI), s=np.std(lROI)))
    logger.debug("Right ROI........: Mean={m:0.4f}, Stdev={s:0.4f}".format(
      m=np.mean(rROI), s=np.std(rROI)))

  if __SAVEROIS:
    logger.debug("")
    logger.debug("Saving ROIs...")
    np.savetxt("AllData.csv", scaledData, delimiter=",")
    np.savetxt("ROICenter.csv", reformROIArray(cROI, cxl, cxr), delimiter=",")
    np.savetxt("ROITop.csv", reformROIArray(tROI, txl, txr), delimiter=",")
    np.savetxt("ROIBottom.csv", reformROIArray(bROI, bxl, bxr), delimiter=",")
    np.savetxt("ROILeft.csv", reformROIArray(lROI, lxl, lxr), delimiter=",")
    np.savetxt("ROIRight.csv", reformROIArray(rROI, rxl, rxr), delimiter=",")
    logger.debug("Saved")
    
  rois = {
    "croi-mean":np.mean(cROI),
    "croi-std":np.std(cROI),
    "troi-mean":np.mean(tROI),
    "troi-std":np.std(tROI),
    "broi-mean":np.mean(bROI),
    "broi-std":np.std(bROI),
    "lroi-mean":np.mean(lROI),
    "lroi-std":np.std(lROI),
    "rroi-mean":np.mean(rROI),
    "rroi-std":np.std(rROI)
  }
  logger.debug("Region of Interest: %s", rois)
  
  return rois
